name: TX_ADDENDUM_NOTES
description: Extract Note (HNO) records containing addendum information for the note.

columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the note record. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the note record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: TX_ADDENDUM_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Legacy item used to identify related note records containing addendum information for the note.
